english.segment1: Abandoned  Left for dead / Kept outside, ostracized. Unwanted in your eyes / Cut me off, thrown aside
english.segment2: Is this why I was born? / Is this what I come from?. This world has been lost long ago / God is my home
english.segment3: Estranged, bastard I am / Never had the reasons why. God has taken me in / Healed my wounds, loved me in my sin
english.segment4: Is this why I was born? / Is this what I come from?. This world has been lost long ago / God is my home
english.segment5: God has taken the one you never wanted. My home  God is my home
